Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.components

Class TransformComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.components.TransformComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class TransformComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Stores and modifies information about objects.

    This class implements the Component interface and provides methods for modifying the position,rotation angle, and scale of an object.

    Since:
    3
